summary: Core three-page romantic front-end experience with custom History-API routing, themed styling, and animated decor components was added, but required static image assets are not present in the diff and several unrequested/forbidden backend/auth-related files were introduced (including paths explicitly listed as immutable in the BuildRequest constraints).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames (hearts-bg-tile.dim_512x512.png, kiss-stamp.dim_256x256.png, two-girls-jumping-heart.dim_1200x900.png, star-sprite.dim_128x128.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references these assets in CSS/components, but no files under frontend/public/assets/generated are shown as added in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend canister file (even if empty), despite the request requiring a static front-end experience with no additional backend services.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to introduce additional backend services; diff adds backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/introduced Internet Identity + authentication context and actor/react-query plumbing, which is a stated non-goal and also touches paths listed as immutable in constraints.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include authentication/Internet Identity integration, and constraints list frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx, and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts as immutable/not to be modified; diff includes these files with II/react-query/actor code.
